name: WhirledMind
description:
Whirled Mind

Save your village! You're the HERO! The "Bad Boss" wants to terrorize your follow friends by controlling their minds! Quick!

This game was made for the JamDNA5 by Mee. Everything was made from scratch within the given time (96h) except for: Font (Luckiest Guy from Google Fonts)

Controls

-arrow keys: movement
-spacebar: attack
-escape: exit the game

Criteria #1: Whirl
To turn on or around an axis with force or speed.

-hero's attack, clouds rotating around the village, hypnotized eyes rotating, bad boss' tornado attack

Criteria #2: Mischevious
Causing mischief.

-bad boss turning happy villagers into mind slaves, bad boss talking about destruction (burned village)

Criteria #3: Happy
Enjoying, showing, or marked by pleasure, satisfaction, or joy.

-cheerful music, happy villagers, villagers dance after a victory, cute voices

Criteria #4: Upbeat Sounds
An unaccented beat or beats that occur before the first beat of a measure.

-anacrusis in the background music

Software used

Unity, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity, Gimp

Some Random Thoughts

Thanks everyone for participating! This is my second jam! I would never think of drawing something (honestly I suck at drawing stuff^^) but I'm quite happy with this result.


Cheers.
